name: Project Gaia
description:
Welcome to my first dip into game development. Written in RPG Maker MZ, Project Gaia is a survival adventure. You play as Sora Starchaser, a surveyor on an exploration mission ambushed by pirates in deep space. Now the sole survivor and stranded in orbit over a strange planet, you must brave the mysteries of the surface below if you are to find the materials to fix your ship and get home. 

v0.0.1 Alpha. The first act content is nearly complete for some styles of play. 

Feel free to join the Discord server for updates, bug reporting, and community chat.

https://discord.gg/q89ECvwN
